description: Shared test patterns and knowledge for AI-driven Gauge testing

test_patterns.title: Login Form - Valid Credentials
test_patterns.description: Test login form with valid username and password

test_patterns.title: Login Form - Invalid Credentials
test_patterns.description: Test login form with invalid credentials shows error

test_patterns.title: Registration - Happy Path
test_patterns.description: New user can register with valid data
steps: Fill in all required fields with valid data
Verify confirmation email or success message

test_patterns.title: Registration - Duplicate Email
test_patterns.description: Registration with existing email shows appropriate error
steps: Enter an email that already exists
Verify error message about duplicate email

test_patterns.title: Required Field Validation
test_patterns.description: Form submission with empty required fields shows validation errors

test_patterns.title: Email Field Validation
test_patterns.description: Invalid email format shows validation error
steps: Navigate to form with email field

test_patterns.title: Add Product to Cart
test_patterns.description: User can add a product to the shopping cart
steps: Navigate to cart and verify product is present

test_patterns.title: Checkout Flow
test_patterns.description: User can complete a purchase through checkout

test_patterns.title: Search Returns Results
test_patterns.description: Searching for a known item returns relevant results

test_patterns.title: Search with No Results
test_patterns.description: Searching for unknown term shows no-results message
steps: Type a query that returns no results
Verify empty state or no-results message

test_patterns.title: Navigation Links Work
test_patterns.description: All main navigation links navigate to correct pages
steps: From home page, click each navigation link
Verify correct page loads for each link

test_patterns.title: Tab Navigation
test_patterns.description: All interactive elements are keyboard accessible
steps: Use Tab key to move through interactive elements
Verify all elements receive focus in logical order
